It’s story time!

The Birth of Vilvah

In 2017, the seeds of Vilvah were sown in a home kitchen. The first product our founder created was goat milk soap to treat her daughter’s eczema prone skin.

The same year we launched our flagship retail store in coimbatore.

It's story time!

Grown organically through Word Of Mouth:

In 2018, we gained more trust and loyalty from our customers.

We were started recognized by more people purely through word of mouth. We expanded our production facility and developed a R&D team

It’s story time!

Sustainability emerged as our core value

In 2019, we embraced sustainability by switching to eco-friendly aluminum packaging, advancing our commitment to a greener future.

That very year, we secured a listing on Nykaa and significantly amplified our online presence.

It’s story time!

Challenging Times during Pandemic

As soon as we opened our 2nd Flagship store in Chennai, Pandemic hit in just 1 week. We were determined to give back to the society in whatever possible way.

We did our bit by contributing thousands of hand sanitizers to support our front line workers and took care of our #TeamVilvah family financially.

It’s story time!

Growth and Expansion

In 2021 we moved into our 25,000 sqft green building with state of the art facility and R&D.

We expanded our retail presence with a new store in Phoenix mall , Chennai.

It’s story time!

Innovations in Skin and Haircare segment

In 2022, we were awarded the title of “Fastest growing D2C start-up in India”

We launched our Signature Milk Range of products, which is a path breaking innovation in skin & haircare

It’s story time!

Year of Retail Expansion

As 2023 unfolds, We are thrilled by the fantastic response to our Milk Range and emerged as India's 1st Milk based Skin and Haircare brand with introduction of different Milk based products. We have launched retail stores across Tirupur, Bangalore and Kochi.

We furthered our commitment to sustainability by completely shifting to Green Energy with Solar panels.

Why Is It Important To Buy Natural Skin Care Products

When it comes to skincare you have a number of brands or products to choose from. Natural ingredients can provide a wide range of benefits for the skin, such as hydrating, exfoliating, and reducing inflammation. Plus, they often contain antioxidants and other nutrients that can help protect and nourish the skin. buying natural skin care products can be a great way to take care of your skin while also being mindful of your health and the environment. Natural skin care products are less likely to cause allergic reactions or irritation, making them a good choice for those with sensitive skin. If you're looking for natural skin care products that will keep your skin healthy and glowing, you've come to the right place. Our line of all-natural skin care products is carefully crafted to nourish and protect your skin using only the highest quality ingredients.

FAQ

How do I find out my skin type?

  • Step 1: Use a good cleanser to wash your face.
  • Step 2: Pat it and do not apply any products.
  • Step 3: Wait for 30 minutes to examine your face.
  • If you feel your skin is tight when you smile, you have dry skin
  • If your skin is a little shiny, you have normal skin
  • If your skin is a lot shinier, you have oily skin
  • If you have oil only in your T zone, you have a combination of skin
  • If you feel slightly itchy, you have a sensitive skin

Find out how to get glowing skin.

To get your glowing skin use Vilvah aloe vera gel. Aloe vera gel is a holy grail for most of your skin and hair problems. It helps you to get rid of Sunburn, Acne, Redness, rash, or any skin infection.

Do you need different products for the AM and PM routine?

Yes, you need different skin care products for your AM and PM routine. During your AM routine, it's a must that you use your cleanser, toner, moisturizer, and sunscreen. During your PM routine You need your cleanser, toner, serum, and moisturizer here you can skip your sunscreen during your PM routine.
